articles.author: Tami Luhby
articles.title: Republicans use debt ceiling bill to push work requirements for millions receiving Medicaid and food stamps - CNN
articles.description: House Republicans are using the debt ceiling standoff to advocate for one of their longstanding goals -- requiring more low-income Americans to work in order to receive government benefits, particularly food stamps and Medicaid.
articles.content: House Republicans are using the debt ceiling standoff to advocate for one of their longstanding goals requiring more low-income Americans to work in order to receive government benefits, particularly… [+8272 chars]

articles.title: Biden, 80, makes 2024 presidential run official as Trump fight looms - Reuters
articles.description: President Joe Biden launched his re-election bid on Tuesday with a promise to protect American liberties from "extremists" linked to former President Donald Trump, who he beat in 2020 and might face again in 2024.
articles.content: WASHINGTON, April 25 (Reuters) - President Joe Biden launched his re-election bid on Tuesday with a promise to protect American liberties from "extremists" linked to former President Donald Trump, wh… [+6158 chars]
